name: Private Tour
description:
$300 + GST ($315 including tax) for up to 8 people
$37.50 + GST ($39.38 including tax) for each additional person above 8
 
 
 
 
 
This tour will allow you to experience alot of Vancouver while moving at an easy pace. You'll leave an expert in Vancouver's history, culture, art & culinary scene. This tour appeals to visitors of all ages and is a great way to get a feel for the city if you've got a tight schedule.
